name: Furious City Moto Bike Rider – Race Simulator Game
name_original: Furious City Moto Bike Rider – Race Simulator Game
description:
BRAND GAME LAUNCHED:
Being a motorbike rider, you may have been waiting for city drive on brand new extreme motorbikes. If so, then play Furious City Moto Bike Rider – Race Simulator Game simulation free game. Driving for city motorbike racing will make you surprise as passing on city streets and through skyscrapers is a wonderful experience. Pick passengers on your moto bike from stations and drop them at their destinations. This bike simulator 3D is the best moto game of 2017.

HOW TO PLAY? VERY INTERESTING AND EASY TIPS:
» Playing Furious City Moto Bike Rider – Race Simulator Game is as easy as a, b, c or 1, 2, 3.
» Hold your device vertically after installing game.
» Press play button to start the game, pause button to pause, replay and continue. Press Rate Us button to rate the game.
» Your passengers are waiting for you on road. Pick the passengers to drop at their destinations.
» Blue lines are drawn on roads to show you the path. Simply follow the blue lines and reach your destinations. Map also directs you to your destination in very easy way.
» In some levels, you have to find the passengers yourself and drop them at home.
» The lovely scenery of the city, its sky scrapers, bridges and blue water river will make you feel awesome.

FEATURES OF THE GAME:
» Real motor sounds recorded from real bikes
» Realistic motorbike physics
» Realistic motorbikes sound effects
